Title: Expands felony sex offenses to include certain offenses related to prostitution and human trafficking
Summary: Expands felony sex offenses to include promoting prostitution in the second degree, promoting prostitution in the first degree, compelling prostitution, sex trafficking, and sex trafficking of a child.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to making certain offenses related to prostitution and sex trafficking felony sex offenses
